comment: Gun proponents like to repeat the famous quote that government should fear its citizens, not the other way around. And I agree. But when the GOP was fearing a bunch of screaming middle aged female citizens recently, the gun obsessed suddenly didn't believe that anymore. Why?
amr:
# ::snt Gun proponents like to repeat the famous quote that government should fear its citizens, not the other way around. And I agree. But when the GOP was fearing a bunch of screaming middle aged female citizens recently, the gun obsessed suddenly didn't believe that anymore. Why?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / like-01
            :ARG0 (p / proponent
                  :mod (g / gun))
            :ARG1 (r / repeat-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (q / quote-01
                        :ARG1 (c / contrast-01
                              :ARG1 (r2 / recommend-01
                                    :ARG1 (f / fear-01
                                          :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
                                                :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01))
                                          :ARG1 (c2 / citizen
                                                :poss g2)))
                              :ARG2 (r3 / recommend-01
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 (f2 / fear-01
                                          :ARG0 g2
                                          :ARG1 (c3 / citizen
                                                :mod (f3 / female)
                                                :ARG0-of (s / scream-01)
                                                :age (t / temporal-quantity
                                                      :quant (m2 / middle)))))
                              :ARG1-of (f4 / fame-01))))
            :snt2 (a / and
                  :op2 (a2 / agree-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / i)))
            :snt3 c
            :ARG2 (b / believe-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :ARG1-of (o / obsess-01
                              :ARG0 (g4 / gun)))
                  :ARG1 (t2 / that)
                  :manner (s2 / sudden)
                  :time (f5 / fear-01
                        :ARG0 (p3 / political-party
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "GOP"))
                        :ARG1 (c4 / citizen
                              :mod f3)
                        :quant (b2 / bunch)
                        :ARG0-of s))
            :time (r4 / recent))
      :snt4 (c5 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a3 / amr-unknown)))

comment: Hey there, derogatory comments are not productive. Please refrain from using them and consider other peoples feelings when posting. Thanks
amr:

      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (p / productive-03
                  :polarity -

            :ARG2 (t / there))
      :snt2 (a / and

      :snt3 (t3 / thank-01
